attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I got this app thinking that trump would declare and represent the Christian community more but no. It just seems like he’s forcing us all into trying to do what he wants in a very passive aggressive manner. I don’t appreciate always being yelled at too. If we submitted our mobile phone number (which I GLADLY GAVE) he would constantly yell at me which hurt my feelings a lot. One example would be him always saying stuff like “Pres Trump: I just reviewed the Presidential Honor Roll. Why didn't I see your name? I don't take this lightly, friend. JOIN NOW: bit.ly/3iNmh1K” I’m very offended by how he’s treating all his fellow supporters. I came by this app on tik tok after hearing the amazing reviews but I guess it was all just overpraised! 😡(ง'̀-'́)ง

attributes.title: Horrible app. Delete now
attributes.review:
I downloaded app hoping for pictures of Obama. Instead I got this orange lace front flying off child molester. I never liked him and I don’t know how Apple could support him knowing what he has done with little children and even people above 18 he’s is a homophobic, non women equality, racist, ugly orange rat that got burnt during his spray tan. CALLIN HIM THE DEVIL, WOULD BE A DISGRACE TO THE DEVIL HIMSELF. And he doesn’t deserve to be our president. (Instructions unclear, my dog is dead🥴)
